message.content:
cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.MM

This paper deals with user location privacy in mobile edge clouds, which involves security and networking aspects. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). The paper also discusses the deployment of MECs and their services, which falls under the category of cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). Additionally, the paper proposes strategies to optimize the chaff services, which can be considered as a form of resource allocation, falling under the category of cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing). The paper also discusses the use of heuristics and optimization techniques, which can be categorized under cs.SY (Systems and Control). Finally, the paper discusses the efficacy of the proposed solutions through simulations, which falls under the category of cs.MM (Multimedia).
